name: Jean-Gabriel Paquette
details: I rarely like to write reviews, but the Marketify team truly deserve a standing ovation for their customer support, customisation and most importantly, friendliness and professionalism. Many thanks once again for everything and hope that I get to deal with you again in the near future.

name: Shreshth Sapra
details: Harsh has proven himself to be most reliable programmer for us, when it comes to faster and very accurate tasks.He sticks to the timeline and understands the urgency as a company to its core. Our company is looking forward to do multiple projects together with him in the future.

name: Bavo Knaeps
details: Very pleasant to work with !. Fast responses and adjusts well to feedback. Has comprehensive understanding of new technologies with correct implementations.

name: Sachin_Korla
details: Harsh is a great team player and is proficient in Website UI - Backend Development.  Harsh worked for the InternWell website and did a very commendable job on time.  I wish him great success ahead.
